3390.description: Midgaard's public anvil sits here, awaiting paying do-it-yourselfers.

3071.description: A pair of hard leather sleeves is lying on the ground.

3100.name: Northwest end of Concourse

0.description: You see the Bridge.

2.description: The concourse continues south.

3100.description:
You are at the concourse, the city wall is just west.  A small promenade
goes east, and the bridge is just north of here.  The concourse continues
south along the city wall.

3101.name: Promenade

2.description: Park Road leads south.

3.description: You see the Concourse.

3101.description:
The river gently flows west just north of here.  The promenade continues
further east and to the west you see the city wall.  Park Road leads south
from here.

3102.name: Promenade

0.description: A rickety old bridge crosses the river, heading towards the city dump.

1.description: You see people moving in and out of Kate's Diner.

2.description: You see the park entrance.

3.description: You see the promenade.

3102.description:
The river gently flows west just north of here.  The promenade continues
both east and west.  A rickety bridge crosses the river to the north, towards
the city dump (fortunately, the wind is blowing towards the dump today).
South of here you see the entrance to the park, and a small building seems
to be just west of the entrance.  Austral Square, home of Kate's Diner, lies
to your east.

3103.name: Austral Square

0.description: You smell the heavenly scents of Kate's Diner.

2.description: The small path leads south.

3.description: You see the promenade.

3103.description:
The Promenade opens here onto Austral Square, on the south bank of the
Midgaard River.  All around you is the bustle of Southern Midgaard--
shopkeepers on break, a town gossip or two prattling away.  You hear the
river lapping at the pilings of the dock by Kate's Diner, which is to your
north.  Emerald Avenue begins to the south, the Promenade continues west,
and the concourse ends to your east.

3104.name: Northeast end of Concourse

0.description: A strong stone bridge crosses the river.

2.description: The Concourse continues south, towards an intersection with Penny Lane.

3.description: You Austral Square.

3104.description:
You are at the Concourse.  The city wall is just east and Austral Square,
home of Kate's Diner, is west.  Looking across the river you see an old
warehouse.  A strong stone bridge crosses the river to the north, where the
concourse becomes wall road.  The Concourse continues south along the wall.

3105.name: Park Entrance

0.description: You see the promenade.

2.description: You see the park.

3105.description:
You are standing just inside the small park of Midgaard.  To the north is
the promenade and a small path leads south into the park.  To your east is
the famous Park Cafe.

3106.name: Park Cafe

3.description: You see the park entrance.

3106.description:
You are inside Park Cafe, a very well lighted, cosy place. The cafe
is built from large logs. Through the windows in the northern wall you
see the river, and through the southern window you see many vigorous
colorful plants.

3107.name: Small path through the park
3107.description:
You are walking along a small path through the park.  The path continues
south and east. A freshly paved path leads west, and you hear sounds of
merriment from there.

3108.name: Small path in the park

0.description: You see the northern park entrance.

3108.description:
You are standing on a small path inside the park.  The park entrance is
just north of here, and Park Cafe is just east of the entrance.  The path
leads further east and west.

3109.name: Small path in the park
3109.description:
You are on a small path running through the park.  It continues west and
south and just north of here you see the southern wall of Park Cafe.

3110.name: Cityguard Head Quarters

3.description: You see a sign saying 'KEEP OUT'.

3110.description:
You are inside a tidy office.  A big desk made from dark wood is standing
in the centre of the room.

3111.name: Park Road

3.description: You see the cityguard head quarters.

3111.description:
The road continues north and south.  A building is just west of here, you
notice a sign on the door.  The park entrance is to the east.

3112.name: Western Park Entrance
3112.description:
You are standing at the western end of the park.  A small path leads east
into the park and going west through the entrance you will reach Park Road.

3113.name: A path in the park

3.description: You see the western park entrance.

3113.description:
You are in the park.  The paths lead north and west.  Westwards is the
park entrance and to the east you see a small pond.

3114.name: The Pond
3114.description:
You are swimming around in the pond, feeling rather stupid.  You can get
back on the path from the eastern and western end of the pond.

3115.name: A path in the park
3115.description:
You are in the park.  The paths lead north and east.  Eastwards is the
park entrance and to the west you see a small pond.

3116.name: Eastern Park Entrance
3116.description:
You are standing at the eastern end of the park.  A small path leads west
into the park.  Going east through the entrance you will reach Emerald
Avenue.

3117.name: Emerald Avenue
3117.description:
You are at Emerald Avenue which continues north and south.  To the west is
the park entrance and to the east is the not very big Town Hall of Midgaard.

3118.name: Park Road
3118.description: You are on Park Road which leads north and south.

3119.name: Emerald Avenue
3119.description:
You are standing at a bend on Emerald Avenue.  The road leads north and west.
To the east, you see some run-down slums...it looks like the bad part of
town.

3120.name: Road Crossing
3120.description:
You are in the middle of the road cross.  Roads lead in all directions.
A road sign is here.

3121.name: Emerald Avenue
3121.description:
You are standing at a bend on Emerald Avenue.  The road leads south and
east.

3122.name: Park Road
3122.description:
You are on Park Road which leads south and north.  Elm Street is east of
here.

3123.name: Elm Street
3123.description:
You are on Elm street.  Park Road is to the west and Elm Street continues
in eastward direction.

3124.name: Elm Street

0.description: You see the beginnings of Midgaard's bad neighborhoods.

3124.description:
You near the end of Elm Street.  An old elm tree grows here.  The concourse
joins Elm Street to the east, and the street ends to the north near a run-down
neighborhood.

3125.name: Emerald Avenue
3125.description:
You are on Emerald Avenue which continues north.
The Concourse is south of here.

3126.name: Park Road
3126.description: You are on Park Road which continues north.  The Concourse is south of here.

3127.name: On the Concourse
3127.description:
You are at the southwest corner of the city wall.  The Concourse leads
both north and east.

3128.name: On the Concourse

0.description: Emerald avenue lies to the north.

1.description: You can see the heavily guarded southern gate of Midgaard.

3128.description:
You are walking around the scenic concourse as it continues its path around
the city of Midgaard.  The south gate of the city lies to your east, and the
southwestern corner of the city wall is west.  Emerald Avenue stretches out
to the north.

3129.name: On the Concourse

3.description: You see the south gate of Midgaard.

3129.description:
The concourse continues its path around the city.  The southern gates of the
city are west of here, and park road lies north.  The southeastern corner of
the city wall is east.

3130.name: On the Concourse
3130.description:
You are at the southeast corner of the city wall.  The Concourse leads
both north and west.

3131.name: Park Road
3131.description: You are at Park Road which continues north and south.

3132.name: Emerald Avenue
3132.description:
You are standing on the north end of Emerald Avenue.  To the north is
Austral Square and Kate's Diner, to the east is the small street Penny Lane.

3133.name: Emerald Avenue
3133.description:
You are standing at a bend on Emerald Avenue.  To the east the road goes on
and to the south is the Road Crossing.

3134.name: Emerald Avenue
3134.description:
You are standing at a bend on Emerald Avenue.  To the west the road goes on
and to the north is the Road Crossing.

3135.name: Park Road
3135.description:
You are at a bend on Park Road.  To the north the road goes on and to the
east is the Road Crossing.  To the south, the ancient cliffs rise from deep
under the ground, forming a wall.

3136.name: Park Road
3136.description:
You are at a bend on Park Road.  To the south the road goes on and to the
west is the Road Crossing.

3137.name: The Waiting Room

1.description: It looks like some kind of office.

3.description: The exit west leads to Emerald Avenue.

3137.description:
You are standing in the waiting room at the town hall.  Wooden chairs stand
along the walls and a long desk is placed in the middle of the room.

3138.name: The Mayor's Office

3.description: The waiting room is to the west.

3138.description:
You are in the not very big office of the Mayor of Midgaard.  A large and
polished but completely empty desk is standing in front of an armchair that
looks so comfortable that it most of all resembles a bed with the head end
raised slightly.

3139.name: Penny Lane
3139.description:
You are on Penny Lane.  Emerald Avenue is to the west and Penny Lane
continues in eastward direction.

3140.name: Penny Lane
3140.description:
You are on Penny Lane.  The narrow road continues north and west, and
the concourse intersects this street to the east.

3141.name: The end of Penny Lane
3141.description: You are at the end of Penny Lane.  The only exit appears to be south.

3142.name: Captain's Office

1.description: You see the Cityguard Head Quarters.

2.description: You see the heavy steel door.

3142.description:
You are in the Office of the Captain of the Guard.  The Midgaard Coat of
Arms is hanging on the north wall and a heavy steel door is to the south.

3143.name: The Jail

0.description: You see the heavy steel door.

3143.description:
You are in a dark and humid jail.  The dark stone walls are hard and cold
to the touch.  A heavy steel door is to the north.

3144.name: The end of Elm Street

2.description: Elm street continues towards a graveyard.

3144.description:
Elm street ends here, next to a dangerous-looking run down neighborhood.
You can enter the slums to the east, or head towards the graveyard to the
south.  It occurs to you that this isn't the happiest section of town.

3150.name: Kate's Diner

0.description: A small boat landing lets boats land at the diner.

2.description: You see Austral Square.

4.description: You see the far-off halls of Valhalla.

3150.description:
The smells of baking bread and simmering stew lead you dancing through
the doorway of the diner.  No greasy spoons to be seen here-- the booth
walls are covered in casual paisleys; the chairs are carved wood, rescued
from garage sales.  Most tables have chess or backgammon boards carved and
painted on their fingertip-smooth tops.  The refrain of some musical or
other from the 1930's blends with the dusty golden light and the wonderful
smells to put you completely at ease.  A huge picture window looks out
over the Midgaard River, and a doorway leads north onto the dock and the
South Bank river landing, while the main entrance to the south returns you
to Austral Square. On most days you will find Kate here, testing a batch
of stew or brewing a special pot of cinnamon coffee, eerily just in time
for your arrival Pull up a chair, perhaps play a game, and take time out
to talk.

3160.name: Melancholy's Maps

0.description: sign on the door says, "Unauthorized Personel Prohibited".

2.description: To the south is the Poor Alley.  Across the alley, you see the Grubby Inn.

3160.description:
As you walk in, a sudden gust of wind enters the shop and sends several
scraps of paper fly around the room.  You blink as the dust you've stirred
up stings your eyes, and take a look around the shop. This shop is
cluttered with old pieces of parchment, stacks of books, and odd
scraps.  A desk with slightly less clutter than the rest of the shop
is in front of you.  A scroll case full of scrolls is behind the desk.  A
bookcase is to the right of you, and to the left is a window overlooking
the Common Square.  A small door, half hidden by a stack of books, leads
to a room in the back of the shop.

3161.name: Melancholy's Room

2.description: A small door to the south leads out into the map shop.

3161.description:
A faint smell of incense teases your nose as you enter this room.  You step
onto a soft bearskin rug and look around.  A simple bed lies against the far wall.
At the foot of it is a sturdy, ironbound chest, most likely full of Melancholy's
trappings from her adventuring days.  On a small table under a window to the
east is a vase with a single white rose.  Other than that, the room is quite bare.

3170.name: Temple Of Stupid

0.description: Poor Alley is to the north.

3170.description:
As you enter the abandoned warehouse your eyes blink violently to adjust to
the almost total darkness.  You wonder where the windows are as you step
into a mud puddle in the middle of the floor.  As your eyes adjust, you realize
that there are mud puddles all around the room, and this is some weird version
of windows.  In a flash of revelation, you realize that you've entered the Temple
of Stupid.

3200.name: Under the Bridge
3200.description:
The arch under the bridge is covered by seaweed for one foot
above the surface of the river.  The water gently flows
through an opening in the lower part of the city wall.

3201.name: On the River
3201.description:
North of here you see the miserable buildings of the poor alley.  The river
flows west towards the bridge.  The riverbanks are too steep to climb.

3202.name: On the River
3202.description:
North of here you see the dump.  The river flows from east to west.
The riverbanks are too steep to climb.  A bridge passes overhead,
connecting the dump to the promenade.

3203.name: On the River

2.description: You see the landing in the back of Kate's Diner.

3203.description:
The levee is directly north of here, and a small boat landing for
Kate's Diner is to the south.  The river flows in an east west direction.

3204.name: On the River
3204.description:
You see the warehouse on the northern riverbank. East of here the river
passes under the eastern bridge and through the city wall. The banks of the
levee are west, in the direction of the current.

3205.name: On the River

1.description:
The iron bars are broken, allowing passage through the hole in the
wall. Beyond the bars you see a dark tunnel.

3205.description:
The river enters from a hole in the eastern city wall.  The hole
has been blocked by several vertically positioned iron bars set into the
wall. Overhead you can see the stone buttresses of the eastern bridge.

3250.name: Wall Road

0.description: The eastern gate of the city is north.

2.description: You see an intersection with a dark alley.

3250.description:
Wall road extends north and south along the eastern walls of the city. The
east gate is north of you, south is an intersection with a dark alley. You check
to make sure you still have your wallet.

3251.name: Wall Road

0.description: Wall road continues to the north, heading towards the gate.

2.description: Wall road continues to the south, towards a bridge over the Midgaard river.

3.description:
A dirty, unlight alley lies to the west...it looks like a
perfect spot for a mugging.

3251.description:
You are walking along the eastern wall of the city, on a road
extending between the east gate and a bridge to the south.  A dark, dirty
alley lies west of here.  You step carefully around a pool of liquid...who
knows what it could be in a place this foul...

3252.name: Wall Road

0.description: You see an intersection with a dark alley.

2.description: The eastern bridge crosses the river to the south.

3252.description:
The walls of Midgaard tower above you to the east, keeping the city safe
from its enemies...you hope.  An intersection with a dark alley lies north,
and a bridge over the Midgaard river is south.  Beyond the bridge wall road
turns in the concourse.

3253.name: On the Bridge

0.description: Wall road continues to the north.

2.description: The concourse stretches around the southern parts of Midgaard.

3253.description:
You are crossing a strong stone
bridge, which spans the Midgaard river. Below you, the river flows into an
opening in the city wall, sealed with strong metal bars.  North of you is
wall road, south of here the concourse loops around the inside of the city
walls.

3254.name: The South Bridge

0.description: In the distance to the north you can see the Temple of Mota.

2.description: The beautiful promenade lies along the river.  What a romantic place to visit!

3254.description:
You are standing on a large white marble bridge leading from the Temple of
Mota to the under-construction Council Tower.  Below you are the swift-moving
currents of the Midgaard river.

3255.name: Inside the South Gate of Midgaard

1.description: The concourse heads east along the inside of the city wall.

2.description: You see the southern gate.

3.description: The concourse heads west along the inside of the city wall.

3255.description:
Two strong stone towers surround a heavy wooden gate set into the city wall,
to guard against the goblins that lurk in the southern forests.  You can exit
the city to the south, if you dare, or walk down the concourse to the east or
west.

3256.name: Outside the South Gate of Midgaard

0.description: You see the southern gate.

2.description: The green forests of the Miden'nir are south, hiding countless goblin warriors.

3256.description:
You are standing outside the strong wooden gate on the
southern walls of Midgaard.  Guards eye you suspiciously from the two
towers on either side of the gate, as they stand watch to protect the city
from the goblins of this forest.  The trees and goblins of the Miden'nir
are south, the gate back to Migaard lies north.

3257.name: Wall Road

0.description: You see an intersection between wall road and a busy Clan street.

2.description: The west gate of the city lies south.

3257.description:
You are walking along wall road, just north of the west gate of Midgaard.
The road continues along the western wall to the north, towards an
intersection with a busy Clan street.

3258.name: Wall Road

0.description: Wall road  continues to the north, towards the northwestern corner of the wall.

1.description: You see the shops and clan halls of Clan Road.

2.description: Wall road continues alongside the western wall, heading towards the west gate.

3258.description:
Wall road intersects with a crowded Clan Road here, filled with shops
and artisans. The street stretches off to the east, towards the far wall of the
city. Wall road continues to the north and south.

3259.name: Wall Road

0.description: You see the northwestern corner of the city wall.

2.description: To the south, wall road intersects with a crowded Clan street.

3259.description:
You are walking along wall road, which extends along the inside of the
western wall of Midgaard.  To the south, you can see an intersection with
a crowded Clan street.  The northwestern corner of the city wall lies ahead
to the north.

3260.name: The Northwest Corner

1.description: Wall road continues along the northern wall of the city.

2.description: Wall road continues along the western wall of the city.

3260.description:
You are standing beneath the northwestern corner of the city wall, on
a turn in wall road.  You can head south, towards the west gate, or east,
to the north gate.

3261.name: Wall Road

1.description: Wall road continues to the east, towards the northern gate of Midgaard.

3.description: You can see the northwest corner of the city wall to the west.

3261.description:
The city walls tower over you as walk down wall road, between the
northwestern corner of the wall to the west, and the northern gate of
Midgaard to the east.

3262.name: Inside the North Gate of Midgaard

0.description: The northern plains are visible through the gate.

1.description: Wall road continues to the east, alongside the northern wall.

3.description: Wall road continues to the west, alongside the northern wall.

3262.description:
Two small towers surround a strong wooden gate, connected by a small stone
bridge set with murder holes.  This gate is not as heavily guarded as the
others, as the plains outside are safe to travel.  You can leave Midgaard
to the north, or continue along wall road to the west and east.  A
teeming clan street is visible to the south, and beyond that the graceful
spires of the Temple of Mota, but there is no way to reach them from here.

3263.name: Wall Road

1.description: You see the northeastern corner of the city walls.

3.description: The northern gate of the city lies east.

3263.description:
You are walking along wall road, between the northern gate of the city
and the northeastern corner of the city walls.  You can see bloodstains on
the road... better be on guard for thieves.

3264.name: The Northeast Corner

2.description: Wall road continues to the south, along the eastern wall of the city.

3.description: Wall road continues to the west, along the northern wall of the city.

3264.description:
Wall road turns the corner here, as you pass by the northeastern edge of
the city wall.  The north gate lies to your west, and the road south leads
to the eastern gate of Midgaard.

3265.name: Wall Road

0.description: You can see the northeast corner of the city wall.

2.description: You see an intersection with a crowded street.

3265.description:
Just south of you is an intersection with a crowded clan street.  The eastern
wall of Midgaard is beside you, and to the north you can see the northeast
corner of the city wall.

3266.name: Wall Road

0.description: Wall road continues to the north, along the eastern wall of the city.

2.description: Wall road continues to the south, towards the east gate of Midgaard.

3.description: You see a mass of people heading down Clan Road.

3266.description:
Here, wall road meets up with a busy clan street heading off towards
the west, and the far wall of the city.  You can smell spices, perfume,
freshly cured hide, and other strange scents, all mingle together
in one heady aroma. Wall road continues to the north and south.

3267.name: Wall Road

0.description: You see an intersection with a busy clan street.

2.description: You see the well-guarded east gate of Midgaard.

3267.description:
You are near the center of wall road, just north of the east gate of the city.
To the north, you can see an intersection with a crowded clan street. The
guards at the gate eye you suspiciously from afar.

3268.name: Outside the North Gate of Midgaard

0.description: You see a dusty trail leading around the city.

2.description: You see the north gate of Midgaard.

3268.description:
You stand outside the north gate of the walled city of Midgaard.  A dusty
trail is visibile to the north, it stretches around the walls of the city.
Further north are the wide expanses of the northern plains, leading to the
village of Ofcol.  You can return to Midgaard to the south.

3270.name: On the Concourse

0.description: The concourse continues to the north, along the city wall.

2.description: The concourse heads south, passing by a beautiful park.

3270.description:
The strong stone walls of Midgaard rise up to the west, keeping evil at bay.
The concourse heads towards a bridge to the north, and continues south
alongside a beautiful park.

3271.name: On the Concourse near the park

0.description: The concourse heads north, passing by a beautiful park.

2.description: You can see the southwest corner of the city wall.

3271.description:
You are walking down the Concoruse, along the western wall of
Midgaard.  To the north, the road passes by a beautiful park, to the
south, you can see the southwest corner of the city wall.

3272.name: On the Concourse at Penny Lane

0.description: The concourse continues to the north, towards the east bridge.

2.description: The concourse continues south, towards an intersection with Elm Street.

3.description: You see Penny Lane.

3272.description:
You are on a road leading around the inner walls of Midgaard.  To
the north, the concourse heads towards a bridge into northern Midgaard.
To the south, you can see an intersection with Elm Street.  The quaint
paved streets of Penny Lane lie west.

3273.name: On the Concourse at Elm Street

0.description: The concourse continues to the north, towards an intersection with Penny Lane.

2.description: The concourse continues to the south, towards the southeast corner of the wall.

3.description: You see Elm Street and the graveyard entrance.

3273.description:
The air grows chill as you pass near the Elm Street graveyard.  The walls
of Midgaard are to the east, and the concourse continues to the north and
south. To your west, you see Elm Street at the graveyard entrance.

3301.name: Clan Road

3.description: Wall Road is to the west.

3301.description:
You are standing on the western end of Clan Road.  The traffic here is light.
This is a quieter section of Midgaard. You can hear the sound of haggling coming
from the east.

3302.name: Clan Road

2.description: The money changer is to the south.

3.description: Clan Road continues west.

3302.description:
You are walking along Clan Road.  To the south of you is the money changer.
Clan Road continues on to the east and the west.

3303.name: Clan Road

0.description: The Thera Institution for the Insane is North.

1.description: Clan Road continues to the east.

3.description: Clan Road continues to the west.

3303.description:
The shops on this stretch of Clan road are long-closed and boarded up.
Not much traffic passes through this part, as there is nothing to buy.

3314.name: Clan Road

0.description: North is the dimly lit entrance to a ticket booth.

1.description: Clan Road continues to the east.

2.description: The Great Square.

3.description: Clan Road continues to the west.

3314.description:
Noise and light abound on this part of Clan Road.  Clan road continues
off to the east and west. A shabby kind of booth is seen to the north.

3315.name: Clan Road

1.description: Clan Road continues to the east.

2.description: A busy pub is to the south.

3.description: Clan Road continues to the west.

3315.description:
Clan Road seems to widen here slightly, allowing more traffic to travel through
the area.  To the south is another entrance to the busy pub.  This door is
also open wide and spilling forth the sounds of happy patrons.  Clan Road
continues to the east and west.

3316.name: Clan Road

0.description: To the North is Griswald's Repair Shop

1.description: Wall Road is east of here.

2.description: To the south is The Paintball Shop

3.description: Clan Road continues to the west.

5.description: The Kats Clan area is downward.

3316.description:
You are at the eastern end of Clan Road.  To the east of you, the tall wall
around the city looms up before you and casts its shadow on you.  Clan Road
continues to the west.

3334.name: A Money Changer's Room

0.description: Clan Road is to the north.

3334.description:
A few strategically placed lanterns keep this place well-lit in the absence
of any windows.  The room is surprisingly well appointed with tapestries
hanging on the walls.  You'd wager your life the moneylender's guards are
behind them, as there are none here.  The moneylender himself works from
behind a large desk, no doubt holding a fortune in gold and silver. A
smallish sign hangs on the wall, lettered in common.

3352.name: Grebe's Tavern

0.description: You see a video game to the north.

2.description: A dark alley is to the south.

3352.description:
Dive.  That's all you can say about this place; it's a dive.  You step
carefully over the dead and/or drunk sailors on the floor toward the
center of the room.  There's no decorations on the wall; they've all been
ripped down in anger or for use as weapons at one time or another.
Looking around, you search vainly for a clean table to sit at, and then
give up.

3355.name: Andy's Pub

1.description: You see another room in the pub.

2.description: The bar is to the south of you.

3355.description:
The busy pub is filled with patrons. People are laughing and singing. A
minstrel plays his lute in another part of the pub, and a few people are even
dancing.  Andy, the pubs owner, wanders around and checks to see that the
needs of his customers are met. The bar is to your south.  East of you is
another section of the pub.  You know that there are rooms to be had
somewhere around here...

3356.name: A Room in the Pub

0.description: Clan Road is to the north.

2.description: The bar is to your south.

3.description: Another room in the pub is to your west.

4.description: A set of stairs leads up to the reception area.

3356.description:
This part of the pub is filled with dancing and singing.  A wandering minstrel
is on a chair in a corner with his lute.  A busty red headed woman is standing
near him and singing a tale of comedic heroism. Drunk men sit laughing at
their tables and busy bar maids weave through the crowd with full mugs and
horns of ale and mead.  Another part of the pub is located to your west. The bar
is to the south.  A set of steps occupy in a corner of the room.  They lead up
to the inn section of this prosperous establishment.

3357.name: The Bar

0.description: The pub proper is to the north.

3357.description:
A long mahogany bar is set in the back of the pub.  Mugs line a shelf behind
the bar.  Bottles of strong, nasty looking liquids decorate one of the
lower shelves.  A large cask rests on a table behind the bar.  A strong
but friendly-looking bartender stands next to the cask polishing glasses.
A couple of the bar maids stand in a corner and throw the most inviting
glances your way. A sign is on the wall.

3358.name: The Bar

0.description: The pub proper is to the north.

3358.description:
A long mahogany bar is set in the back of the pub.  Mugs line a shelf
behind the bar.  Bottles of strong, nasty looking liquids decorate one of
the lower shelves.  A large cask rests on a table behind the bar.  A strong
but friendly looking bartender stands next to the cask polishing glasses.
A couple of the bar maids stand in a corner and throw the most inviting
glances your way.

3359.name: The Inn

5.description: The stairs lead back down to the pub.

3359.description:
You are standing upstairs from Andy's Pub at Andy's Inn.  A few chairs
and a couple of end tables give the room a `homey' atmosphere.  A large
stone fireplace burns brightly against one wall and warms the room.  A
large oak desk is nestled in one corner of the room.  A small man with
wire-framed glasses sits behind the desk working dilligently on his books.
He looks up as you enter the room.  He looks at you quizzically.  He is
probably waiting for you to ask him for a room.

3360.name: Paladin's Meditation Room

0.description: To the North is the Entrance to the Cleric's Guild.

3360.description:
This is a small room with very litle light supplied by small candles.
You can smell incense from somewhere outside the room.  A staircase leads
down into darkness.  At odds with the dark, austere room is the small 
collection of Weapons of the Faith.

3361.name: The Necromancer's Domain

3.description: To the west is the entrance to the Mages Guild.

3361.description:
This room is dark and cold.  An eerie feeling creeps up your spine
as you have entered the training grounds of the dreaded necromancers.
In this room they study the ways of Lord Lotus and learn to master
the dark ways of magic.  A staircase leads down into darkness and up
to a plush mansion

3362.name: The Tournament and Practice Yard

1.description: To the east is the Entrance to the Fighter's Guild.

5.description:
You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be
impossible to climb back up.

3362.description:
The practice yard of the rangers.  Fine weapons line the walls of
this room.  A staircase leads down into darkness.

3363.name: The Bard's Music Room

0.description: To the North is the entrance to the Rogues Guild.

5.description:
You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be
impossible to climb back up.

3363.description:
This room is cheerful and clean.  Several musicians fill the room.
Each of them trying to outdo the other fellow.  Here the bards can also
practice their combat skills.  A staircase leads down into darkness.

3364.name: The {YPaint{bball{x Shop

0.description: To the north is Clan Road

3364.description:
The walls of this small store are plastered with various weapons,
masks, equipment, and clothing suitable for a game of paintball.  There
are posters of tanks, jets, and military vehicles scattered throughout
the store.  You wonder what kind of a sick person would dedicate their
life to this kind of business.

3365.name: The Questmaster's Quarters

3.description: To the west you can barely see the entrance to mud school.

3365.description:
You enter an eerie cavern filled with fluorescent lights that blanket
the walls with mysterious and ominous shadows.  Amidst the assortment of
flashing colors, you can make out an old man meditating in the middle of
the damp cavern.  He glances up to look at you as you enter and then
smiles with a knowing grin.  Yet another has come to request a challenge.

3366.name: Griswald's Repair Shop

2.description: To the south is clan road.

5.description: A stair leads downward to a hot and noisy room.

3366.description:
This shop is small and cozy.  You can see several tools lineing
the walls.  Most of them are easily recognizable.  Hammers, mallets,
and even a forge.  It appears Griswald has everything he needs to
repair your damaged equipment.

3367.name: The Smithy

4.description:
An extremely substantial and heavily worn door stands atop a long
staircase. The door looks as if it is sometimes used to keep an entire
army out of this room.

3367.description:
This room is the hottest place you have ever been. Hot metal is
being poured and pounded into weapons of every kind imaginable. Some make
fine swords, delicately balanced and carefully detailed. Others simply
fashion any odd contraption that is sufficiently lethal. The din of metal
hitting metal and the unbearable heat make this room one in which not many
stand around idly. There is a stairwell that leads up out of this small
taste of Hell.

3368.name: Land of Flaming Sword Ticket Booth

2.description: The entrance of the booth exits back to Clan Road.

3368.description:
The ticket salesgnome for the Land of Flaming Sword plies his trade
here. The room is a threadbare, ramshackle hut with no features other
than a {Wbig sign{x and a wide door. Paint is peeling off the walls and
there is a faint smell of mold or perhaps mildew. Someone has not quite
successfully removed some old dried blood stains from the floor.

3369.name: Ticket Booth Back Room

2.description: The ticket booth is south of here.

3369.description:
This is a kind of holding tank for adventurers on their way to battle in
the Open Arena. If you are here for any length of time, something probably
went wrong. Please leave by the exit to the south and report this to an
Immortal.

3370.name: The School of Skills
3370.description:
You have entered a large schoolroom with several desks, 
lit by lanterns placed strategically around the room.  
There is a large bookshelf located behind the teacher's 
desk, but off to the left of the blackboard.  This shelf 
contains books containing all the knowledge on skills 
and spells that Raychyl, the Skillsmistress, has learned 
throughout her years of study.  The word "Skills" has 
been written on the blackboard and underlined three 
times.

3001.name: The Temple Of Mota

0.description: At the northern end of the temple hall is a statue and a huge altar.

1.description: There is a big commotion to the east.

2.description: You see the Temple Square.

3.description: To the west is the Midgaard Library.

4.description: You see the entrance to Mud School.

3001.description:
You are in the southern end of the temple hall in the Temple of Mota.
The temple has been constructed from giant marble blocks, eternal in
appearance, and most of the walls are covered by ancient wall paintings
picturing gods, giants and peasants.
   Large steps lead down through the grand temple gate, descending the huge
mound upon which the temple is built and ends on the temple square below.
   Equally large steps lead UP through a small door into the ENTRANCE to MUD
SCHOOL.  (type 'up' to go to MUD SCHOOL.)  A small plaque is on this wall.
A large sign is hung by the paintings on the stone wall.

3002.name: Cleric's Inner Sanctum

1.description: You see your favorite place, the bar of divination.

3002.description:
This is the inner sanctum.  A picture of the mighty Mota is hanging on
the wall, just above the altar which is set against the western wall.  A well
in the middle of the floor leads down into darkness.  Vile smells waft from
the depths.

3003.name: Cleric's Bar

2.description: You see the entrance.

3.description: You see the inner sanctum.

3003.description:
The bar is one of the finest in the land, lucky it is members only.  Fine
furniture is set all around the room.  A small sign is hanging on the wall.

3004.name: Entrance to Cleric's Guild

0.description: You see the bar, richly decorated with really stylish furniture.

2.description: To the South is the Entrance to the Monk's Guild.

3004.description:
The entrance hall is a small modest room, reflecting the true nature of
the Clerics.  The exit leads east to the temple square.  A small entrance to
the bar is in the northern wall.

3005.name: The Temple Square

0.description: You see the temple.

1.description: You see the good old Grunting Boar Inn.

2.description: You see the Market Square.

3.description: You see the entrance to the Clerics Guild.

5.description: You see a spiral staircase leading into misty darkness.

3005.description:
You are standing on the temple square.  Huge marble steps lead up to the
temple gate.  The entrance to the Clerics Guild is to the west, and the old
Grunting Boar Inn, is to the east.  Just south of here you see the market
square, the center of Midgaard.

3006.name: Entrance to the Grunting Boar Inn

3.description: You see the temple square.

3006.description:
You are standing in the entrance hall of the Grunting Boar Inn.  The hall
has been wisely decorated with simple but functional furniture.  A small
staircase leads up to the city bank and the bar is to the east.

3007.name: The Grunting Boar

3.description: You see the exit to the entrance hall.

3007.description:
You are standing in the bar.  The bar is set against the northern wall, old
archaic writing, carvings and symbols cover its top.  A fireplace is built into
the western wall, and through the southeastern windows you can see the temple
square.  This place makes you feel like home.
A small sign with big letters is fastened to the bar.

3008.name: The City Bank
3008.description:
You are in a large bank with many tellers. The bank is open 24 hours a day.
Aligned along the south wall are several lockers and safety deposit boxes
available for the citizens use.

3009.name: The Bakery

2.description: You see the main street.

3009.description:
You are standing inside the small bakery.  A sweet scent of Danish and
fine bread fills the room.  The bread and Danish are arranged in fine order
on the shelves, and seem to be of the finest quality.
A small sign is on the counter.

3010.name: The General Store

2.description: You see the main street.

3010.description:
You are inside the general store.  All sorts of items are stacked on shelves
behind the counter, safely out of your reach.
A small note hangs on the wall.

3011.name: The Weapon Shop

2.description: You see the main street.

3011.description: You are inside the weapon shop.  There is a small note on the counter.

3012.name: Main Street

0.description: You see the magic shop.

2.description: You see the entrance to the Guild of Magic Users.

3.description: You see the city gate.

3012.description:
You are at the end of the main street of Midgaard.  South of here is the
entrance to the Guild of Magic Users.  The street continues east towards the
market square.  The magic shop is to the north and to the west is the city
gate.

3013.name: Main Street

0.description: You see the bakery.

2.description: You see the armoury.

3.description: You see the main street.

3013.description:
You are on the main street passing through the City of Midgaard.  South of
here is the entrance to the Armoury, and the bakery is to the north.  East of
here is the Market Square.

3014.name: Market Square

0.description: You see the temple square.

2.description: You see the common square.

3.description: You see the main street.

3014.description:
You are standing on the market square, the famous Square of Midgaard.
A large, peculiar looking statue is standing in the middle of the square.
Roads lead in every direction, north to the temple square, south to the
common square, east and westbound is the main street.

3015.name: The Main Street

0.description: You see the general store.

2.description: You see the Jeweller's Shop.

3.description: You see the market square.

3015.description:
You are on Main Street crossing through town.  To the north is the general
store, and the main street continues east.  To the west you see and hear the
market place and to the south is the Jeweller's Shop.

3016.name: The Main Street

0.description: You see the weapon shop.

2.description: You see the swordsmen's guild.

3.description: You see the main street leading to the market square.

3016.description:
The main street, to the north is the weapon shop and to the south is the
Guild of Swordsmen.  To the east you leave town and to the west the street
leads to the market square.

3017.name: Entrance to Magic User's Guild

0.description: You see the main street.

1.description: To the east is the entrance to the Necromancer's Guild.

2.description: You see your favorite place, the Mage's Bar.

3017.description: The entrance hall is a small, poorly lit room.

3018.name: Mage's Bar

0.description: You see the lobby.

3018.description:
The bar is one of the wierdest in the land.  Mystical images float around
the air.  Illusions of fine furniture appear all around the room.

3019.name: Mage's Laboratory

3.description: You see the bar.

3019.description:
This is the Magical Experiments Laboratory.  Dark smoke-stained stones
arch over numerous huge oaken tables, most of these cluttered with strange-
looking pipes and flasks.  The floor is covered with half-erased pentagrams
and even weirder symbols, and a blackboard in a dark corner has only been
partially cleaned, some painful-looking letters faintly visible.  A well in
the middle of the floor leads down into darkness.  Vile smells waft from the
depths.

3020.name: The Armoury

0.description: You see the main street.

3020.description:
The armoury with all kinds of armours on the walls and in the window.  You
see helmets, shields and chain mails.  To the north is the main street.
On the wall is a small note.

3021.name: Entrance Hall to the Guild of Swordsmen

0.description: You see the main street.

1.description: You see the swordsmen's bar, many noises comes from there.

3.description: To the west is the Ranger's Guild.

3021.description:
The entrance hall to the Guild of Swordsmen.  A place where one has to be
careful not to say something wrong (or right).  To the east is the bar and to
the north is the main street.

3022.name: The Bar of Swordsmen

2.description: You see the practice yard.

3.description: You see the entrance hall to the thieves guild.

3022.description:
The bar of swordsmen, once upon a time beautifully furnished.  But now the
furniture is all around you in small pieces.  To the south is the yard, and
to the west is the entrance hall.

3023.name: The Tournament and Practice Yard

0.description: You see the bar.

5.description:
You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be
impossible to climb back up.

3023.description:
The practice yard of the fighters.  To the north is the bar.  A well leads
down into darkness.

3024.name: Eastern End of Poor Alley

0.description: You see Melancholy's Map Shop

2.description: You see the Inn.

3.description: You see the poor alley.

3024.description:
You are at the poor alley. South of here is the Grubby Inn and to the
east you see Common Square. Melancholy's Map Shop is north. The alley continues
further west.

3025.name: The Common Square

0.description: You see the Market Square.

2.description: You see the city dump.

3.description: You see the poor alley.

3025.description:
The Common Square, people pass you talking to each other.  To the west is
the poor alley and to the east is the dark alley.  To the north, this square
is connected to the Market Square.  In the distance to the south you can see
the bridge crossing the Midgaard River, and beyond that is the construction
of the new Council Tower.

3026.name: The Dark Alley

0.description: You see a foul-smelling sailor's dive.

2.description: You see the entrance to the Thieves Guild.

3.description: You see the Common Square.

3026.description:
The dark alley, to the west is the Common Square and to the south is the
Guild of Thieves.  Grebe's Tavern, the famous sailor's dive, is north.
The alley continues east.

3027.name: Entrance Hall to the Guild of Rogues

0.description: You see the alley.

1.description: You see the Thieves Bar where everything disappears.

2.description: To the south is the Bard's Guild.

3027.description:
The entrance hall to the thieves' and assassins' guild.  A place where you
can lose both your life and your money, if you are not careful.  To the north
is the dark alley and to the east is the thieves' bar.

3028.name: The Thieves Bar

2.description: You see the Secret Yard.

3.description: You see the entrance hall to the Thieves Guild.

3028.description:
The bar of the thieves.  Once upon a time this place was beautifully
furnished, but now it seems almost empty.  To the south is the yard, and to
the west is the entrance hall.
   (Maybe the furniture has been stolen?!)

3029.name: The Secret Yard

0.description: You see the bar.

5.description:
You can't see what is down there, it is too dark.  Looks like it would be
impossible to climb back up.

3029.description:
The secret practice yard of thieves and assassins.  To the north is the
bar.  A well leads down into darkness.

3030.name: Near the Bridge

0.description: You see the Common Square.

2.description:
You see a river between northern and southern Midgaard.  A large bridge
spans the flow.

3030.description:
You stand on the wide paved road leading from the Temple of Mota to the
under-construction Council Tower.  Just south is the bridge extending over
the Midgaard River, and the entrance to the sewer system is through a man-
sized hole down.

3031.name: The Pet Shop

2.description: You see the Alley.

3031.description:
The Pet Shop is a small crowded store, full of cages and animals of
various sorts and sizes.  There is a sign on the wall.

3032.name: Pet Shop Store
3032.description:
This is the small dark room in which the Pet Shop Boy keeps his pets.
It is vital that this room be immediately after the pet shop.

3033.name: The Magic Shop

2.description: You see the Main Street.

3033.description:
You are in a small room that smells of rare chemicals and spices.
Dividing the room in two is a large desk, and on the wall behind it are
numerous shelves crammed with jars, bottles, books and scrolls of all
sorts and sizes.

3034.name: The Jeweler's Shop

0.description: You see Main Street.

3034.description:
You are in a small, beautifully furnished room.  The warm light emanating
from the small oil lamps on the walls is reflected in the hard, polished
surface of the big mahogany desk that stands in the center of the room.
A small sign with golden letters is on the desk.

3035.name: The Leather Shop

2.description: You see the alley.

3035.description:
An acrid smell fills this large room.  Along the walls are numerous
shelves containing all sorts of animal hide and in the crackling fireplace
hangs a big iron pot with boiling water.  In the middle of the room is a
large oak table.
A wooden sign is hanging above the fireplace.

3040.name: Inside the West Gate of Midgaard

0.description: Wall road runs along the inner city wall to the north.

2.description:
You see the road running along the inner side of the city wall.  You notice
that it is called Wall Road.

3.description: The city gate is to the west.

3040.description:
You are by two small towers that have been built into the city wall and
connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate.  Main Street leads
east and Wall Road leads both north and south from here.

3041.name: Inside the East Gate of Midgaard

0.description: Wall road heads north along the city wall.

2.description: Wall road heads south towards the poor section of town.

3.description: You see Main Street.

3041.description:
You are by two small towers that have been built into the city wall and
connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate.  Main Street leads
west from here.  Wall road crosses the street, heading north and south along
the city wall.

3042.name: Wall Road

0.description: You see the city gate.

2.description: The road continues further south.

3042.description:
You are walking next to the western city wall.  The road continues further
south and the city gate is just north of here.

3043.name: Wall Road

0.description: The road continues further north.

2.description: The road continues further south.

3043.description:
You are walking next to the western city wall.  Wall Road continues further
north and south.  A small, poor alley leads east.
Some letters have been written on the wall here.

3044.name: Poor Alley

0.description: The leather shop is to the north.

2.description: There is an ornate doorway to the south.

3.description: The alley leads west.

3044.description:
You are in narrow and dirty alley leading east and west.  The leather shop
is to the north.

3045.name: Alley at Levee

0.description: You see, hear, and smell the pet shop.

2.description: You see the levee.

3.description: The alley leads west.

3045.description:
You are standing in the alley which continues east and west.  South of
here you see the levee.  North is the Pet Shop.

3046.name: Eastern end of Alley

0.description: You see a pricey-looking potion shop.

1.description: You see wall road running a north-south loop around the city.

2.description: You see the warehouse.

3.description: You see the alley.

3046.description:
You are standing at the eastern end of the alley,  near the city walls.
Wall road loops around the city to your east, and you can see an old
three-story warehouse to the south.  The Fountain of Youth Apothecary is
north.

3047.name: Wall Road

0.description: You see the road.

1.description: You see the purple and orange Mob Factory.  Someone has no taste.

2.description: You see the bridge.

3047.description:
You are standing on the road next to the western city wall which
continues north.  South of here is a bridge across the river.  To the east,
you see an odd looking building painted bright orange with purple trim...
it must be the Mob Factory!

3048.name: Grubby Inn

0.description: You see the alley.

3048.description:
You are inside the old Grubby Inn.  This place has not been cleaned for
several decades, vile smells make you dizzy.

3049.name: Levee

0.description: You see the Alley.

2.description: You see the river flowing west.

3049.description:
You are at the levee.  South of here you see the river gently flowing west.
The river bank is very low making it possible to enter the river.  Directly
across the river you can see a small boat landing built off of Kate's Diner.

3050.name: Abandoned Warehouse

0.description: You see the alley.

4.description: You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.

3050.description:
You are inside the only room in the old warehouse.  The place is very dusty
and appears to have been unused for many years.  The skylight spills
violet-tinged light.

3051.name: On the Bridge

0.description: You see the road.

2.description: You see the Concourse.

3051.description:
You are standing on the stone bridge that crosses the river.  The bridge is
built out from the western city wall and the river flows west through an
opening in the wall ten feet below the bridge.

3052.name: Outside the West Gate of Midgaard

0.description: The trail continues around the City of Midgaard.

1.description: The city gate is to the east.

3.description: The forest edge is to the west.

3052.description:
You are by two small towers that have been built into the city wall and
connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate.  To the west you
can see the edge of a big forest. A small dusty trail leads north along the
wall.

3053.name: Outside the East Gate of Midgaard

0.description: The trail continues around the City of Midgaard.

3.description: You see the city gate.

3053.description:
You are by two small towers that have been built into the city wall and
connected with a footbridge across the heavy wooden gate.  To the east the
plains stretch out in the distance. To the north a small dusty trail follow
the city wall.

3054.name: By the Temple Altar

0.description: The Great Square.

2.description: You see the southern end of the temple.

4.description: Bifrost, the Rainbow Bridge, hangs in the sky above you.

5.description: A swirling mist blocks your vision downward.

3054.description:
You are by the temple altar in the northern end of the Temple of Mota.
A huge altar made from white polished marble is standing in front of you and
behind it is a ten foot tall sitting statue of Odin, the King of the Gods.
The back of the altar opens into a beautiful atrium, above which can be
seen a rainbow.

3056.name: The Fountain of Youth Apothecary

2.description: You see the eastern end of alley.

3056.description:
An old man putters around behind the counter, making strange love potions
and curative philtres.  He turns as you enter, and looks on with avarice.
Judging from the furnishings, he's been made very wealthy by his trade.

3057.name: In the air...

5.description: Back down on the earth where you should be!

3057.description: WOW you can fly!  You are floating in the air above Temple Square of Midgaard.

3058.name: The Great Square

0.description: A high-rent section of Clan Road is to the north.

2.description:
The end of the rainbow is to the south. You might remember the Temple
of Mota being there, but someone tore it down.

3058.description:
Great? Not yet it isn't. Mostly it is mud. With deep wagon ruts.
It is very large, though.

3072.long_descr: A cityguard is here guarding the gate.  He is half asleep.
3072.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

mobprogs.commands:
if ispc($n)
say You get into your seat right now and get ready to learn, $n!
else
glare $n 
endif

3200.description:
Raychyl is a rather severe looking professor, with puckered cheeks, 
glasses, and a hard frown.  She is dressed in a white blouse and 
a floor-length brown dress.  She carries around a ruler, the better 
to teach you with.

3171.long_descr: Griswald says, "Hi Ho neighbor! What can I do for ya?"

mobprogs.commands:
shake
say No no, that's not how I do business.
say It's much simpler to just do REPAIR ALL.
say You may want to read HELP REPAIR for details.
give $o $n

3171.description:
If you ask him about his long days and nights from far off lands,
you might hear an interesting tale about Diablo ;).

Type: 'help repair'

3090.long_descr: A small loyal kitten is here.
3090.description: The cute kitten looks like a fierce fighter.

3091.long_descr: A small loyal puppy is here.
3091.description: The cute puppy looks like a fierce fighter.

3092.long_descr: A small, quick, loyal beagle is here.
3092.description: The beagle looks like a fierce fighter.

3093.long_descr: A large loyal rottweiler is here.
3093.description: The rottweiler looks like a strong, fierce fighter.

3094.long_descr: A large trained wolf is here.
3094.description: The wolf looks like a strong, fearless fighter.

3095.description: This monkey looks like a quick fighter.

3140.long_descr: The captain of the guard is looking very upset.

3100.long_descr: The maid is waiting for your order.
3100.description:
She is very beautiful with golden hair, and deep blue eyes. A good reason
for coming here more often.

3172.long_descr: A ticket salesgnome is selling tickets to the Open Arena here.

mobprogs.commands:

   mpforce $n south
   break
endif
say Welcome, $n, to the Land of Flaming Sword!
if level($n) >= 90
   pmote tells $n, "If you want to go there, give me 300 gold pieces."
   pmote expectantly holds out his hand to $n.
   break
endif

   pmote expectantly holds out his hand to $n.

   pmote expectantly holds out his hand to $n.

if level($n) >= 10

if level($n) > 0
   cheer $n
   mptransfer $n 3369
   mpat 3369 mpforce $n thank dispatcher

else

   emo grins as $j pockets the money.
endif

if level($n) < 80

   mptransfer $n 3369

else

   emo grins as $j pockets the money.
endif

if level($n) < 70

   mpat 3369 mpforce $n thank dispatcher
else
   say Sorry, but that's not enough!
   emo grins as $j pockets the money.
endif

if level($n) < 60
   cheer $n
   mptransfer $n 3369
   mpat 3369 mpforce $n thank dispatcher
else
   say Sorry, but that's not enough!
   emo grins as $j pockets the money.
endif

if level($n) < 50
   cheer $n
   mptransfer $n 3369
   mpat 3369 mpforce $n thank dispatcher
else
   say Sorry, but that's not enough!
   emo grins as $j pockets the money.
endif

if level($n) < 40
   cheer $n
   mptransfer $n 3369
   mpat 3369 mpforce $n thank dispatcher
else
   say Sorry, but that's not enough!
   emo grins as $j pockets the money.
endif

if level($n) < 30
   cheer $n
   mptransfer $n 3369
   mpat 3369 mpforce $n thank dispatcher
else
   say Sorry, but that's not enough!
   emo grins as $j pockets the money.
endif

if level($n) < 20

   emo grins as $j pockets the money.

emo grins as $j pockets the money.

3172.description:
A small, ugly gnome stands here with a handful of tickets, looking
rather bored. He looks strong and bears many scars; presumably he is a
veteran of the Arena.

3168.long_descr: Joe Bob is standing here, loading his paintball gun.
3168.description:
He looks like a master marksman.  You'd hate to meet up with him on
the paintball field.

3174.long_descr: A wandering old man stands here, scanning his eyes across the ground.

mobprogs.commands:
scream
  yell Leave me alone, $n!
  emote vanishes in a puff of blue smoke.
  MPGOTO 300

if rand(3)
     MPOLOAD 1201
     MPECHO You notice that the pouch at the old man's side has a hole in it...
     drop token
     break
  endif

say Oooh!  There's one!
  emote picks up a small yellow token.

say I just don't understand it...  my tokens keep disappearing!
  sob
  emote continues searching the ground.

if rand(25)
     north
     break
  endif
  if rand(33)
     east
     break
  endif
  if rand(50)
     south
     break
  endif
  if rand(100)
     west
     break
  endif

emote wanders off in search of his tokens...
  if rand(25)
     MPGOTO 3001
     break
  endif
  if rand(33)
     MPGOTO 6103
     break
  endif
  if rand(50)
     MPGOTO 9506
     break
  endif
  if rand(100)
     MPGOTO 3521
     break
  endif

say Such honesty!
  beam
  say I appreciate it, but let me reward such an honest person!  Please, keep the token.
  give token $n
  bow

grin $n
  say It's not quite what I'm looking for...  why don't you hang on to it?
  give $o $n

3174.description:
The old man is wandering around, scanning the ground as if looking for something lost.
DOESN'T WORK... *sniff*

3173.long_descr: The gnome and the ticket booth are gone, you are on your own!

mobprogs.commands:
pmote makes a magical gesture at $n.
mpechoaround $n $n disappears, perhaps forever!
pray $n is entering the Land of Flaming Sword.
mpechoat $n Your stomach lurches, then suddenly you are elsewhere...
if rand(8)
   mptransfer $n 12068
   mpat 12068 mpforce $n look auto
   break
endif
if rand(8)
   mptransfer $n 12069
   mpat 12069 mpforce $n look auto
   break

   mpat 12072 mpforce $n look auto
   break

   mpat 12073 mpforce $n look auto
   break
endif
if rand(14)
   mptransfer $n 12074
   mpat 12074 mpforce $n look auto
   break

   mpat 12075 mpforce $n look auto

3173.description:
This gnome looks to be a brother of the Open Arena ticket salesman. He
sends players to their destination in the Open Arena.

3121.long_descr: A swan is swimming around in the pond.
3121.description: The white swan is very elegant.

3122.long_descr: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.
3122.description: The duckling is adorable. It looks most of all like a tiny furball.

3123.long_descr: A sparrow is flapping around on the ground.
3123.description: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.

3124.long_descr: A duck is here quacking happily.
3124.description: The duck is quite fat.  It looks like it is enjoying life.

3000.long_descr: A wizard walks around behind the counter talking to himself.

mobprogs.commands:
if ispc($n)
  if rand(45)
     say How can I help you? Rings? Wands? Potions?
     grin
  else
     smile $n
     say Hello {V$n{x, what would you like today?
  endif
endif

if rand(51)
    say I know I put that bottle on the 53rd shelf.
    grumble
  else
    grumble
    say Adventurers always bothering me for some odd ring or wand.
  endif
endif

3000.description:
The wizard looks old and senile, and yet he looks like a very powerful
wizard. He is equipped with fine clothing, and is wearing many fine
rings and bracelets.

3001.long_descr: The baker looks at you while calmly wiping flour from his face with one hand.

mobprogs.commands:
if ispc($n)
  if sex($n)==2
    grin $n
    say Welcome, My Lady! How may I assist you?
  else
    smile $n
    say Welcome, how may I assist you?
  endif
endif

if rand(50)
   peer
   say I hear they have some nice lamb at the butchery in New Thalos.
else
   smile
   say I remember back in the old days we had to go for weeks without food.
endif

3001.description:
A fat, nice looking baker. But you can see that he has many scars on his
body.

3002.long_descr: A grocer stands at the counter with a slightly impatient look on his face.

mobprogs.commands:
if ispc($n)
  if rand(50)
     twiddle
     say Well, are you going to order something?
  else
     say Is there anything I can help you with?
     grin $n
  endif
endif

if rand(25)
   smile
else
   grumble
endif

3002.description: A tall grocer who moves two 200 pound bags of flour around on his shoulders.

mobprogs.commands:
if ispc($n)
   if rand(50)
      say Hello, how can I help you?
      grin $n
   else
      say Welcome, is there anything I can do for you?
      bow $n
   endif
endif

if rand(40)
   say There is nothing better than a good sword.
   grin
else
   smile
endif

3003.description: A young weaponsmith who still has lots to learn.

mobprogs.commands:
if ispc($n)
   if rand(54)
      say All the best armor in Thera. Best prices anywhere! I will special order.
      grin
   else
      say From New Thalos and the Dragoon Sea to Mount Olympus. The best armor is in this shop... look around.
      smile $n
   endif
endif

if rand(35)
   say I remember once this guy came in and sold me some armour made of gold!
   smile
   say It weighed a ton. He had to use a wagon to carry it.
else
   grin
endif

3004.description:
An old but very strong armourer, he has made more armours in his
lifetime than you have ever seen.

3005.long_descr: A thief all dressed in black.

mobprogs.commands:
if level($n)>=90
     innocent
   endif

if rand(45)
   say How dare you catch me picking your pocket!!!!
else
   egrin $n
endif

3006.long_descr: A retired captain stands here selling boats.

mobprogs.commands:
if ispc($n)
  if rand(45)
     say Welcome mate what be yer needs?
  else
     grin
     say What can I do fer ye mate?
  endif
endif

if rand(45)
   emote sings a catchy tune.
   emote sings "Yo Ho Ho and a bottle of rum!"
else
   cig
   grin
endif

3006.description: This captain has killed more sharks than you have eaten peas.

3007.long_descr: A sailor stands here waiting to train you.
3007.description: He looks like a strong, fit sailor.

3008.long_descr: A pet shop boy is here humming softly to himself.
3008.description: He is young and close-cropped and looks quite happy.

3009.long_descr: The jeweler is standing behind the desk.
3009.description: He is fat and has a contented, although watchful, look on his face.

3010.long_descr: The leather worker is sitting by the table sewing a leather cap.
3010.description:
She looks like an honest, hard-working artisan who only just earns enough to
keep herself going.

3011.long_descr: Super Helga is here waiting to dispense some justice.

mobprogs.commands:
if isgood($n)
    smile $n
    say Greetings traveler of {bL{Ye{Wga{Yc{by{W!!{x
else
    egrin $n
endif

cackle
say You cannot defeat the power of the Almighty Zero!!!
if rand(15)
    cast wrath
endif

smile
if rand(25)
    say Helpful hint: Watch out for those pesky Vampires.  They are everywhere.
endif

bleed
if rand(10)
    yell Help Me!!!!!
endif

smile $n
say Sorry, friend, but I'm the wrong person to give this to!
say You need to give this token to Healer Deirdre.
say She is usually 1 step north of here.
give $o $n

smile $n
say Thank you, $n, but you may need this more than I!
give $o $n

3011.description:
Big. Very big.
That nose is just SOOOOOOO BIG!!!

mobprogs.commands:
if ispc($n)
   if level($n)<6
      say If you have a Newbie token to give me, I will trade it in for you.
   endif
   mpclearmoney
endif

mpjunk token
if ispc($n)
   if level($n)<11
      mpoload 72
      mpoload 73
      mpoload 74
      mpoload 75
      mpoload 76
      mpoload 77
      mpoload 78
      mpoload 79
      mpoload 80
      mpoload 81
      mpoload 82
      mpoload 83
      mpat 3032 put all.newbie kit
      give kit $n
      bow $n
   else
      say You have no use for this at your level.
      mpecho The token disappears in a puff of smoke.
      smile $n
   endif
endif

3012.description:
Although retired from adventuring, the healer still lends a hand.
Type 'heal' to see a listing of spells.

3141.long_descr: A cityguard stands here looking very upset.

3142.long_descr: A secretary is sitting at the desk.
3142.description:
She looks very busy.
The Secretary says "Sorry, but the Mayor is extremely busy today.
Please sit down and have a seat in the meantime."

3143.long_descr: The mayor is here.  He shakes your hand.
3143.description: He is a stocky, middle-aged man with thin, grey hair.

3144.long_descr: The town crier is here weeping quietly.
3144.description: He is very good at his job - completely dissolved in tears.

3020.description:
Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the
vast amount of knowledge she possesses. She is wearing fine magic clothing,
and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.

3021.description:
You are in no doubt that this guildmaster is truly close to your god; he has
a peaceful, loving look. You notice that he is surrounded by a white aura.

3022.description:
You realize that whenever your guildmaster moves, you fail to notice it;
the way of the true thief.  She is dressed in poor clothing, having
the appearance of a beggar.
human

3023.description:
This is your master. A short, strong dwarf with bulging muscles.  Several scars
across his body prove that he was using arms before you were born.  He
has a calm look on his face.

3024.long_descr: A sorcerer is guarding the entrance.
3024.description:
He is an experienced mage who has specialized in the field of Combat Magic.
He is here to guard the Mage's Guild and his superior knowledge of offensive
as well as defensive spells make him a deadly opponent.

3025.long_descr: A knight templar is guarding the entrance.
3025.description:
He is a specially trained warrior belonging to the military order of the Faith.
His duty is to protect the faithful from persecution and infidel attacks and
his religious devotion combined with his superior skill makes him a deadly
opponent.

3026.long_descr: An assassin is guarding the entrance.
3026.description:
He is a thief who has specialized in killing others as effectively as possible,
using all sorts of weapons.  His superior knowledge of how and where to use
them combined with his extraordinary stealth makes him a deadly opponent.

3027.long_descr: A knight is guarding the entrance.
3027.description:
He is an expert warrior who has attained knighthood through countless
chivalrous deeds.  His duty is to protect the Guild of Swordsmen and his
extreme skill combined with his experience in warfare makes him a deadly
opponent.

3150.long_descr: Esme, the waitress, hums to herself and wonders what you'd like to order.
3150.description:
Esme brushes a lock of dark hair away from her wire-rimmed glasess and
smiles warmly at you.

3160.long_descr: Melancholy is here digging through a pile of scrolls, papers, and maps.
3160.description:
Ragged brown hair frames a ghostly, pale face.  Puffy eyelids surround two
sky blue, haunting eyes.  An old, brown robe is wrapped around her frail
frame.  She looks up from her pile of papers and maps and looks inquiringly
at you, smiling faintly.

3161.long_descr: A green tree snake is sitting here on a pile of books.
3161.description:
This is Melancholy's pet tree snake, Lister.  Something seems odd about his
jaw, almost as if he were smiling at you.  He's quite friendly, but don't
get him drunk.

3162.long_descr: Otho the Money Changer sits behind his desk waiting for your coins.
3162.description:
Otho is a grotesquely fat man dressed in rich clothes.  Apparently the money
changing business pays quite well in this busy city, or possibly the rumors
of his fencing services are true...

3163.long_descr: A thief all dressed in black.

3164.description:
Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the
vast amount of knowledge she possesses.  She is wearing a black robe and
an Ankh symbolizing the legends of Lotus.

3165.description:
You are in no doubt that this guildmaster is truely at peace.  You notice
that he is surrounded by a white aura.

3166.description:
Your guildmaster is dressed in a comfortable set of clothing.  She is
playing a flute as she rests in the corner.

3167.description:
He looks very strong and very skillful with his swords.  You wonder
how many years he has spent becomming a master of his trade.

3040.long_descr: A bartender watches you calmly while he skillfully mixes a drink.
3040.description: A tired looking bartender who hates trouble in his bar.

3041.long_descr: A waiter is going around from one place to another.

3042.long_descr:
A man who in his young days was a famous sorcerer but now leads a quiet,
peaceful life as a waiter.

3043.long_descr: A waiter who seems to have reached contact with God.

3044.long_descr: A waiter who knows where all his customers keep their money.

3045.long_descr: A waiter who easily could kill you, and still carry quite a few firebreathers.

3046.long_descr: Filthy is standing here eager to serve you a special drink.
3046.description:
Filthy looks real, ahh, dirty. He likes to keep his customers happy,
but do not mess with him or else he'll get upset.

mobprogs.commands:
say Ohhhhmmmmmmmmmm.......
grin $n
if ispc($n)
say Are you interested in a worldly challenge, $n?
else
wink $n
endif

smile $n
if rand(25)
    say Very good!  Type: {YHELP QUEST{x for info on how to get started.
else
    say Excellent!  I am proud to associate with such brave adventurers.
endif

sigh
if rand(25)
    say 'Tis a shame, Thera is in need of brave adventurers.
else
    say Then may your journeys be fruitful.
endif

3169.description: Type: 'HELP QUEST' for information on Questing.

3170.long_descr: A wandering sage is here, peeking into your inventory.

3060.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

3061.long_descr: A janitor is walking around cleaning up.
3061.description:
The janitor is trundling along, hauling a large 
trash container, complete with mop and bucket, 
behind them.  They mumble something about litter, 
and the uncaring adventurers that just leave 
corpses lying about, not heeding the flies or 
stench or chance of a plague that result from 
that.  Honestly!

3062.description:
Fido is a small dog that has a foul smell and pieces of rotted meat hanging
around its teeth.

3063.long_descr: A vagabond is here looking for victims.

3064.long_descr: A singing, happy drunk wanders around singing about Moria.
3064.description: A drunk who seems to be too happy, and to be carrying too much money.

3065.long_descr: A beggar is here asking for a few coins.
3065.description: The beggar looks like she is fed up with life.

3066.long_descr: An alley cat hisses at you.
3066.description: The alley cat is half starved and more than a little feral.

3067.long_descr: A cityguard is here guarding the gate.
3067.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

3068.long_descr: A cityguard is here guarding the gate.
3068.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

3069.long_descr: A cityguard is here guarding the mayor.
3069.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

3070.long_descr:
An old man eyes you greedily.
The old man says, 'Would you like to buy a nice love potion?'
3070.description: He looks very dangerous.  I wouldn't try to rob him.

3071.long_descr: An alert cityguard is here guarding the gate.
3071.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.
